text: For cell A2 in the attached file, its fmt code is "dd\.mm\.yyyy;@". When I tried to call DateFormatter.getFormat(Cell cell) to get the corresponding Format, the backslash was not unescaped.
creator: zjuwufan@gmail.com

text:
Created attachment 26933
proposed patch to fix this bug.
